casename: Eltraco International Pte Ltd v CGH Development Pte Ltd
counsel: Christopher Chuah (Drew & Napier) for the plaintiffs; Stanley Wong (Jing Quee & Chin Joo) for the defendants; Zaheer Merchant (Madhavan Louis Partnership) for the insurers
tags-parsed: Banking/Performance bonds/Call on performance bond by beneficiary/Interlocutory injunction to restrain payment/Whether beneficiary entitled to make call on performance bond/Whether beneficiary must establish breach of contract first/Whether contractual terms preclude call on performance bond/Whether unconscionable for beneficiary to receive payment under performance bond
